description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。长期掌控天津政法系统，曾任中共天津市委副书记、天津市政协主席、政法委书记等要职。因涉及严重违纪违法问题，于2007年6月3日在其办公室内自杀身亡。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China. He controlled the political and legal system of Tianjin for a long time, serving in key positions such as Deputy Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee, Chairman of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPPCC, and Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission. He committed suicide in his office on June 3, 2007, due to involvement in serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任天津市政协主席，是宋平顺的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPPCC, and predecessor of Song Pingshun.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替宋平顺担任天津市政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Song Pingshun as Chairman of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党天津市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会

nodes.id: 中国共产党天津市委员会政法委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 20世纪90年代初在中国天津市发生的一起轰动一时的非法集资丑闻，与时任天津市政法系统高官宋平顺有关。
description.en: A sensational illegal fundraising scandal that occurred in Tianjin, China in the early 1990s, linked to Song Pingshun, a high-ranking official in Tianjin's political and legal system at the time.

description.zh-cn: 宋平顺的情妇，曾利用与宋平顺的关系承包政府项目以谋取利益。
description.en: Song Pingshun's mistress, who used her relationship with him to secure government contracts for profit.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共天津市委书记。在天津流传的民谣中与宋平顺、武长顺并提。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee. He was mentioned alongside Song Pingshun and Wu Changshun in a popular folk rhyme in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任天津市公安局局长。据称其为宋平顺下属时，二人默契配合，分享寻租空间。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Tianjin Municipal Public Security Bureau. It is reported that when he was Song Pingshun's subordinate, the two cooperated tacitly to share rent-seeking opportunities.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共天津市委书记。在宋平顺自杀后，向外界通报了其涉案情况。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee. After Song Pingshun's suicide, he announced the details of Song's case to the public.

nodes.id: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China.

en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1970年9月加入中国共产党，2007年7月5日因严重违纪违法问题被开除党籍。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in September 1970, and was expelled from the party on July 5, 2007, for serious violations of discipline and law.

relationships.source: 中共中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 对宋平顺的严重违纪违法问题进行了调查。
description.en: Investigated Song Pingshun for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 批准开除宋平顺的中国共产党党籍。
description.en: Approved the expulsion of Song Pingshun from the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会
中国共产党天津市委员会
中国共产党天津市委员会政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 宋平顺包养情妇徐敏，并生有一子。
description.en: Song Pingshun had a mistress, Xu Min, with whom he had a son.

description.zh-cn: 滥用手中权力，为情妇徐敏谋取巨额不正当利益，授意其成立公司承包政府项目。
description.en: Abused his power to obtain huge illicit benefits for his mistress Xu Min, instructing her to set up companies to contract government projects.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪90年代初轰动一时的“永基非法集资案”丑闻与宋平顺有关。
description.en: The sensational 'Yongji Illegal Fundraising Case' scandal in the early 1990s was related to Song Pingshun.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共天津市委书记张高丽向外界通报，宋平顺被查出涉及权钱交易及包养情妇等问题。
description.en: Zhang Gaoli, then Secretary of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee, announced that Song Pingshun was found to be involved in issues such as power-for-money deals and keeping a mistress.

description.zh-cn: 房凤友是宋平顺在中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会主席职位上的前任。
description.en: Fang Fengyou was Song Pingshun's predecessor as Chairman of the CPPCC Tianjin Committee.

description.zh-cn: 邢元敏接替宋平顺担任中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会主席。
description.en: Xing Yuanmin succeeded Song Pingshun as Chairman of the CPPCC Tianjin Committee.

description.zh-cn: 天津流传的民谣“两顺一昌，糊弄中央”将宋平顺与时任天津市委书记张立昌并提，暗示二人存在政治上的利益关联。
description.en: A folk rhyme popular in Tianjin, 'Two Shuns and one Chang, fooling the central government,' mentions Song Pingshun together with then-Tianjin Party Secretary Zhang Lichang, implying a political alliance of interest between them.

description.zh-cn: 天津流传的民谣“两顺一昌，糊弄中央”将宋平顺与时任天津市公安局长武长顺并提。财新传媒报道称，武长顺与上司宋平顺默契配合，分享寻租空间。
description.en: A folk rhyme popular in Tianjin, 'Two Shuns and one Chang, fooling the central government,' mentions Song Pingshun together with then-Director of Tianjin Public Security Bureau Wu Changshun. Caixin Media reported that Wu Changshun tacitly cooperated with his superior Song Pingshun to share rent-seeking opportunities.

description.zh-cn: 在宋平顺担任中共天津市委政法委书记等职务期间，武长顺为其下属，二人被指默契配合，分享寻租空间。
description.en: While Song Pingshun served as Secretary of the Tianjin Political and Legal Affairs Commission and other roles, Wu Changshun was his subordinate. The two were reported to have cooperated tacitly to share rent-seeking opportunities.
